12px;margin:0;word-break:normal;display:block;overflow-x:auto;color:#333;background:#f8f8f8&#125;.markdown-body a&#123;color:#4dd0e1;border-bottom:1px solid #4dd0e1;font-weight:400;text-decoration:none;margin:0 4px&#125;.markdown-body a:active,.markdown-body a:hover&#123;background-color:rgba(77,208,225,.1)&#125;.markdown-body strong&#123;color:#26c6da&#125;.markdown-body strong:before&#123;content:"「"&#125;.markdown-body strong:after&#123;content:"」"&#125;.markdown-body em&#123;font-style:normal;color:#4dd0e1;font-weight:700&#125;.markdown-body table&#123;display:inline-block!important;font-size:12px;width:auto;max-width:100%;overflow:auto;border:1px solid #f6f6f6&#125;.markdown-body thead&#123;background:#f6f6f6;color:#000;text-align:left&#125;.markdown-body tr:nth-child(2n)&#123;background-color:rgba(77,208,225,.05)&#125;.markdown-body td,.markdown-body th&#123;padding:12px 7px;line-height:24px&#125;.markdown-body td&#123;min-width:120px&#125;.markdown-body blockquote&#123;margin:2em 0;padding:24px 32px;border-left:4px solid #26c6da;background:rgba(77,208,225,.15);position:relative&#125;.markdown-body blockquote:before&#123;content:"❝";top:8px;left:8px;color:#4dd0e1;font-size:30px;line-height:1;font-weight:700;position:absolute;opacity:.7&#125;.markdown-body blockquote:after&#123;content:"❞";font-size:30px;position:absolute;right:8px;bottom:0;color:#4dd0e1;opacity:.7&#125;.markdown-body blockquote p&#123;color:#595959;line-height:2&#125;.markdown-body ol,.markdown-body ul&#123;color:#595959;padding-left:28px&#125;.markdown-body ol li,.markdown-body ul li&#123;margin-bottom:0;list-style:inherit&#125;.markdown-body ol li .task-list-item,.markdown-body ul li .task-list-item&#123;list-style:none&#125;.markdown-body ol li .task-list-item ol,.markdown-body ol li .task-list-item ul,.markdown-body ul li .task-list-item ol,.markdown-body ul li .task-list-item ul&#123;margin-top:0&#125;.markdown-body ol ol,.markdown-body ol ul,.markdown-body ul ol,.markdown-body ul ul&#123;margin-top:3px&#125;.markdown-body ol li&#123;padding-left:6px&#125;@media (max-width:720px)&#123;.markdown-body h1&#123;font-size:24px&#125;.markdown-body h2&#123;font-size:20px&#125;.markdown-body h3&#123;font-size:18px&#125;&#125;</style><h1 data-id="heading-0">一、栈</h1>
<h2 data-id="heading-1">简介</h2>
<blockquote>
<p>栈是一种<strong>后进先出</strong>（即LIFO:Last in, First out）的数据结构，在<code>JavaScript</code>中没有栈的结构，但是可以用数组来实现栈的所有功能: <code>push(入栈)</code>和<code>pop（出栈）</code></p>
</blockquote>
<h2 data-id="heading-2">代码实现</h2>
<pre><code class="hljs language-js copyable" lang="js"><span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span> <span class="hljs-title">Stack</span>(<span class="hljs-params"></span>) </span>&#123;
    <span class="hljs-built_in">this</span>.stack = []
    <span class="hljs-built_in">this</span>.push = <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span>(<span class="hljs-params">item</span>) </span>&#123;
        stack.push(item)
    &#125;
    <span class="hljs-built_in">this</span>.pop = <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span>(<span class="hljs-params"></span>) </span>&#123;
        stack.pop()
    &#125;
&#125;
<span class="copy-code-btn">复制代码</span></code></pre>
<h2 data-id="heading-3">应用场景</h2>
<h3 data-id="heading-4">函数调用堆栈</h3>
<p>为了便于理解这个场景，先来看一段代码：</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-js copyable" lang="js"><span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span> <span class="hljs-title">first</span>(<span class="hljs-params"></span>) </span>&#123;
  <span class="hljs-built_in">console</span>.log(<span class="hljs-string">'first start'</span>)
  second()
  <span class="hljs-built_in">console</span>.log(<span class="hljs-string">'first end'</span>)
&#125;

<span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span> <span class="hljs-title">second</span>(<span class="hljs-params"></span>) </span>&#123;
  <span class="hljs-built_in">console</span>.log(<span class="hljs-string">'second start'</span>)
&#125;

<span class="hljs-built_in">console</span>.log(<span class="hljs-string">'start'</span>)
first()
<span class="hljs-built_in">console</span>.log(<span class="hljs-string">'end'</span>)

<span class="hljs-comment">// start</span>
<span class="hljs-comment">// first start</span>
<span class="hljs-comment">// second start</span>
<span class="hljs-comment">// first end</span>
<span class="hljs-comment">// end</span>
<span class="copy-code-btn">复制代码</span></code></pre>
<blockquote>
<p>这段代码执行的结果说明：函数在执行过程中，最先执行的函数会在最后执行完成，遇到<code>first</code>函数时，则进入函数执行，当遇到<code>second</code>函数时，则执行second，在<code>second</code>函数执行完成后继续执行<code>first</code>，最后执行<code>end</code>结束。<br>
这样就很容易的理解为什么说函数调用的逻辑实际就是利用了这种栈的数据结构实现的。</p>
</blockquote>
<h1 data-id="heading-5">二、队列</h1>
<h2 data-id="heading-6">简介</h2>
<blockquote>
<p>队列是一种<strong>先进先出</strong>（即FIFO:First in, First out）的数据结构，在<code>JavaScript</code>中没有队列的数据结构，不过我们依旧可以使用数组来实现队列的功能：<code>enqueue（入队）</code>和<code>dequeue（出队）</code></p>
</blockquote>
<h2 data-id="heading-7">代码实现</h2>
<pre><code class="hljs language-js copyable" lang="js"><span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span> <span class="hljs-title">Queue</span>(<span class="hljs-params"></span>) </span>&#123;
  <span class="hljs-built_in">this</span>.queue = []
  <span class="hljs-built_in">this</span>.enqueue = <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span>(<span class="hljs-params">item</span>) </span>&#123;
    <span class="hljs-built_in">this</span>.queue.push(item)
  &#125;
  <span class="hljs-built_in">this</span>.dequeue = <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span>(<span class="hljs-params"></span>) </span>&#123;
    <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> <span class="hljs-built_in">this</span>.queue.shift()
  &#125;
&#125;
<span class="copy-code-btn">复制代码</span></code></pre>
<h2 data-id="heading-8">应用场景</h2>
<h3 data-id="heading-9">JS任务队列</h3>
<p>由于js是单线程的，所以在处理多个异步函数同时执行的情况下，当异步任务有了结果时，会先进入一个任务队列，在js主线程的同步任务执行完成后，才会读取任务队列，按照异步函数进入任务队列的顺序开始一次支持异步函数的回调函数，即先进入任务队列中的函数会先执行</p>
<h1 data-id="heading-10">三、链表</h1>
<h2 data-id="heading-11">简介</h2>
<blockquote>
<p>链接也是由多个元素组成的列表，但是与队列和栈不同的是，链表的存储是不连续的，而是使用next指向下一个元素。在链表中，我们需要添加删除元素，只需要修改next指针即可。在<code>js</code>中我们可以用<code>object</code>来模拟链表。</p>
</blockquote>
<h2 data-id="heading-12">代码实现</h2>
<pre><code class="hljs language-js copyable" lang="js"><span class="hljs-comment">/**
 * 链表
 * <span class="hljs-doctag">@param <span class="hljs-type">&#123;*&#125;</span> <span class="hljs-variable">val</span></span>
 */</span>
<span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span> <span class="hljs-title">LinkList</span>(<span class="hljs-params">val</span>) </span>&#123;
  <span class="hljs-comment">/**
   * 创建一个node结点
   * <span class="hljs-doctag">@param <span class="hljs-type">&#123;*&#125;</span> <span class="hljs-variable">val</span></span>
   * <span class="hljs-doctag">@param <span class="hljs-variable">node</span></span>
   */</span>
  <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span> <span class="hljs-title">_creatNode</span>(<span class="hljs-params">val</span>) </span>&#123;
    <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> &#123;
      <span class="hljs-attr">val</span>: val,
      <span class="hljs-attr">next</span>: <span class="hljs-literal">null</span>,
    &#125;
  &#125;

  <span class="hljs-built_in">this</span>.head = _creatNode(val)
  <span class="hljs-built_in">this</span>.tail = <span class="hljs-built_in">this</span>.head

  <span class="hljs-comment">/**
   * 查找
   * <span class="hljs-doctag">@param <span class="hljs-type">&#123;*&#125;</span> </span>val 查找val
   * <span class="hljs-doctag">@returns <span class="hljs-variable">node</span></span>
   */</span>
  <span class="hljs-built_in">this</span>.find = <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span> (<span class="hljs-params">val</span>) </span>&#123;
    <span class="hljs-keyword">let</span> node = <span class="hljs-built_in">this</span>.head
    <span class="hljs-keyword">while</span> (node) &#123;
      <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> (val === node.val) &#123;
        <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> node
      &#125;
      node = node.next
    &#125;
    <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> <span class="hljs-literal">null</span>
  &#125;

  <span class="hljs-comment">/**
   * 在node结点后插入结点
   */</span>
  <span class="hljs-built_in">this</span>.insert = <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span> (<span class="hljs-params">insertVal, val</span>) </span>&#123;
    <span class="hljs-keyword">const</span> insertNode = _creatNode(insertVal)
    <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> (val) &#123;
      <span class="hljs-keyword">const</span> node = <span class="hljs-built_in">this</span>.find(val)
      insertNode.next = node.next
      node.next = insertNode
    &#125; <span class="hljs-keyword">else</span> &#123;
      <span class="hljs-built_in">this</span>.tail.next = insertNode
      <span class="hljs-built_in">this</span>.tail = insertNode
    &#125;
  &#125;

  <span class="hljs-comment">/**
   * 遍历
   * <span class="hljs-doctag">@param <span class="hljs-type">&#123;Function&#125;</span> </span>fn 回调函数
   */</span>
  <span class="hljs-built_in">this</span>.map = <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span> (<span class="hljs-params">fn</span>) </span>&#123;
    <span class="hljs-keyword">let</span> p = <span class="hljs-built_in">this</span>.head
    <span class="hljs-keyword">while</span> (p) &#123;
      fn(p)
      p = p.next
    &#125;
  &#125;
&#125;
<span class="copy-code-btn">复制代码</span></code></pre>
<h2 data-id="heading-13">应用场景</h2>
<h3 data-id="heading-14">1. 原型链</h3>
<p>在js中原型链的结构与链表结构非常类似。链表中我们使用next属性来链接下一个元素，而原型链则使用<code>__proto__</code>属性来链接原型对象</p>
<h1 data-id="heading-15">四、集合</h1>
<h2 data-id="heading-16">简介</h2>
<blockquote>
<p>集合是一种<strong>无序且唯一</strong>的数据结构，在<code>JavaScript</code>中，我们可以用es6的<a href="https://developer.mozilla.org/zh-CN/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Set" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer">Set</a>方法直接创建一个集合</p>
</blockquote>
<h2 data-id="heading-17">代码实现</h2>
<pre><code class="hljs language-js copyable" lang="js"><span class="hljs-comment">// 由于es6中有专门的数据结构，可以直接创建一个集合</span>
<span class="hljs-keyword">const</span> set = <span class="hljs-keyword">new</span> <span class="hljs-built_in">Set</span>()

set.add(<span class="hljs-number">1</span>)
set.add(<span class="hljs-number">2</span>)
...
<span class="copy-code-btn">复制代码</span></code></pre>
<h2 data-id="heading-18">应用场景</h2>
<h3 data-id="heading-19">1.数组去重</h3>
<p>通常我们在实际开发中使用<code>Set</code>这种数据结构最多的就是用来去重了，不过在数组去重时，要注意对于引用类型的数据，如果引用不同那么会按不同的值存在集合中，同时<code>Set</code>也可以存储<code>NaN undefined</code>这类的特殊数据</p>
<h3 data-id="heading-20">2.数组判断、删除等操作</h3>
<p>比如在判断数组中是否存在某一个值，或者删除数组中某一个值时，也可以使用<code>Set.prototype.has</code>和<code>Set.prototype.delete</code>等方法方便的对数组进行操作</p>
<h1 data-id="heading-21">五、字典</h1>
<h2 data-id="heading-22">简介</h2>
<blockquote>
<p>字典也是一种存储唯一值的数据结构，但是以<strong>键值对</strong>的方式进行存储。在<code>JavaScript</code>中，我们可以用es6的<a href="https://developer.mozilla.org/zh-CN/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Map" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer">Map</a>方法直接创建一个字典</p>
</blockquote>
<h2 data-id="heading-23">代码实现</h2>
<pre><code class="hljs language-js copyable" lang="js"><span class="hljs-keyword">const</span> map = <span class="hljs-keyword">new</span> <span class="hljs-built_in">Map</span>()

<span class="copy-code-btn">复制代码</span></code></pre>
<h2 data-id="heading-24">应用场景</h2>
<h3 data-id="heading-25">用来存储数据</h3>
<p><code>Map</code>通常可以用来存储一些具有映射关系的数据，类似一个id对应一个内容，这种实现与js中普通对象的功能类似，但是<code>Map</code>的功能更加强大，<code>Objet</code>只能使用字符串、数字等简单类型当作键值，但是<code>Map</code>可以使用任意类型作为键，同时<code>Map</code>也可以直接获取长度；而且就是同样取值的操作，<code>Map</code>执行会比<code>Object[key]</code>这种方式更快。</p>
<h2 data-id="heading-26">与其他类似数据结构区别</h2>
<blockquote>
<p><code>Map</code>和普通<code>Object</code>或<code>Set</code>，都有一些相似或不同的地方，这里也统一总结起来，在之后使用中也更好的根据需求和场景选择合适的数据结构</p>
</blockquote>
<h3 data-id="heading-27">与普通对象<code>Object</code>的区别</h3>
<ol>
<li>有序性：<code>Map</code>会按照原有的添加顺序存储，<code>Object</code>会根据<code>key</code>自动排序</li>
<li>可迭代：<code>Map</code>实现了迭代器，可以使用<code>for...of</code>方式进行遍历</li>
<li>Map可直接获取长度</li>
<li>Map的key可以是任何基本类型，<code>Object</code>只可以是字符串、数字、Symbol</li>
</ol>
<h3 data-id="heading-28">与集合<code>Set</code>的区别</h3>
<ol>
<li>存储：<code>Set</code>只能存储<code>key</code>不能存<code>value</code>，由于<code>key</code>不能重复，所以<code>Set</code>没有重复的<code>key</code></li>
<li>展开：<code>Map</code>展开后每项格式为<code>[key, value]</code></li>
</ol>
<h1 data-id="heading-29">六、树</h1>
<h2 data-id="heading-30">简介</h2>
<blockquote>
<p>树是一种<strong>分层</strong>数据的抽象模型，在<code>JavaScript</code>中没有树这个数据结构，所以通常我们使用<code>Object</code>来模拟一个树的结构</p>
</blockquote>
<h2 data-id="heading-31">代码实现</h2>
<p>为了后面方便测试树的相关操作，我们先模拟一个树的数据结构：</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-js copyable" lang="js"><span class="hljs-keyword">const</span> treeData = &#123;
  <span class="hljs-attr">value</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'1'</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">children</span>: [
    &#123;
      <span class="hljs-attr">value</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'1-1'</span>,
      <span class="hljs-attr">children</span>: [
        &#123;
          <span class="hljs-attr">value</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'1-1-1'</span>,
          <span class="hljs-attr">children</span>: []
        &#125;,
        &#123;
          <span class="hljs-attr">value</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'1-1-2'</span>,
          <span class="hljs-attr">children</span>: [
            &#123;
              <span class="hljs-attr">value</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'1-1-2-1'</span>,
              <span class="hljs-attr">children</span>: []
            &#125;
          ]
        &#125;,
      ],
    &#125;,
    &#123;
      <span class="hljs-attr">value</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'1-2'</span>,
      <span class="hljs-attr">children</span>: [
        &#123;
          <span class="hljs-attr">value</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'1-2-1'</span>,
          <span class="hljs-attr">children</span>: [],
        &#125;,
      ],
    &#125;,
  ],
&#125;
<span class="copy-code-btn">复制代码</span></code></pre>
<h3 data-id="heading-32">深度优先遍历</h3>
<p>树的深度优先遍历即有children就继续遍历children，直到没有children后再遍历下一个结点:
深度优先遍历流程：</p>
<ol>
<li>访问根结点</li>
<li>对根结点的children继续深度优先遍历</li>
</ol>
<pre><code class="hljs language-js copyable" lang="js"><span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span> <span class="hljs-title">des</span>(<span class="hljs-params">root</span>) </span>&#123;
  <span class="hljs-built_in">console</span>.log(<span class="hljs-string">'value'</span>, root.value)
  root.children.forEach(<span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-params">item</span> =></span> &#123;
    des(item)
  &#125;)
&#125;

des(treeData)
<span class="hljs-comment">// value 1</span>
<span class="hljs-comment">// value 1-1</span>
<span class="hljs-comment">// value 1-1-1</span>
<span class="hljs-comment">// value 1-1-2</span>
<span class="hljs-comment">// value 1-1-2-1</span>
<span class="hljs-comment">// value 1-2</span>
<span class="hljs-comment">// value 1-2-1</span>
<span class="copy-code-btn">复制代码</span></code></pre>
<p>可以看出其顺序为优先遍历children，知道children遍历结束开始下一个结点的深度遍历</p>
<h3 data-id="heading-33">广度优先遍历</h3>
<p>广度优先遍历即优先遍历子结点，如果子结点遍历完成，则遍历各子结点的children：
广度优先遍历流程：</p>
<ol>
<li>创建一个数组，将根结点作为第一项</li>
<li>将数组中第一项弹出并访问</li>
<li>将弹出项中的children遍历并依次添加至数组中</li>
<li>重复2、3步骤直到队列为空</li>
</ol>
<pre><code class="hljs language-js copyable" lang="js"><span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span> <span class="hljs-title">bfs</span>(<span class="hljs-params">root</span>) </span>&#123;
  <span class="hljs-keyword">let</span> arr = [root]

  <span class="hljs-keyword">while</span>(tree = arr.shift()) &#123;
    <span class="hljs-built_in">console</span>.log(<span class="hljs-string">'value'</span>, tree.value)
    tree.children.forEach(<span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-params">item</span> =></span> &#123;
      arr.push(item)
    &#125;)
  &#125;
&#125;

bfs(treeData)
<span class="hljs-comment">// value 1</span>
<span class="hljs-comment">// value 1-1</span>
<span class="hljs-comment">// value 1-2</span>
<span class="hljs-comment">// value 1-1-1</span>
<span class="hljs-comment">// value 1-1-2</span>
<span class="hljs-comment">// value 1-2-1</span>
<span class="hljs-comment">// value 1-1-2-1</span>
<span class="copy-code-btn">复制代码</span></code></pre>
<p>从输出结果可以看到树的遍历是按照优先遍历子结点，待子结点遍历后继续遍历子结点的子结点...直到arr数组为空表示遍历完成</p>
<h3 data-id="heading-34">二叉树</h3>
<blockquote>
<p><strong>二叉树</strong>: 树中的每个结点最多只能有两个结点，通常我们使用<code>Object</code>来模拟一个二叉树,二叉树的遍历有先、中、后序遍历三种<br>
<strong>满二叉树</strong>：除最后一层无任何子结点外，每一层所有的节点都有两个子节点的二叉树，如果一个二叉树层数为<code>n</code>,那么满二叉树的结点总数为<code>2^k - 1</code>个<br>
<strong>完全二叉树</strong>：二叉树（除最后一层）的每一个结点必须全部填满，在最后一层所有结点连续集中在最左边</p>
</blockquote>
<p>先模拟一个二叉树的数据结构:</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-js copyable" lang="js"><span class="hljs-keyword">const</span> binaryTreeData = &#123;
  <span class="hljs-attr">value</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'root'</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">left</span>: &#123;
    <span class="hljs-attr">value</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'left'</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">left</span>: &#123;
      <span class="hljs-attr">value</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'left-left'</span>,
      <span class="hljs-attr">left</span>: <span class="hljs-literal">null</span>,
      <span class="hljs-attr">right</span>: <span class="hljs-literal">null</span>,
    &#125;,
    <span class="hljs-attr">right</span>: &#123;
      <span class="hljs-attr">value</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'left-right'</span>,
      <span class="hljs-attr">left</span>: &#123;
        <span class="hljs-attr">value</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'left-right-left'</span>,
        <span class="hljs-attr">left</span>: <span class="hljs-literal">null</span>,
        <span class="hljs-attr">right</span>: <span class="hljs-literal">null</span>,
      &#125;,
      <span class="hljs-attr">right</span>: <span class="hljs-literal">null</span>,
    &#125;,
  &#125;,
  <span class="hljs-attr">right</span>: &#123;
    <span class="hljs-attr">value</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'right'</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">left</span>: &#123;
      <span class="hljs-attr">value</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'right-left'</span>,
      <span class="hljs-attr">left</span>: <span class="hljs-literal">null</span>,
      <span class="hljs-attr">right</span>: <span class="hljs-literal">null</span>,
    &#125;,
    <span class="hljs-attr">right</span>: &#123;
      <span class="hljs-attr">value</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'right-right'</span>,
      <span class="hljs-attr">left</span>: <span class="hljs-literal">null</span>,
      <span class="hljs-attr">right</span>: <span class="hljs-literal">null</span>,
    &#125;,
  &#125;,
&#125;
<span class="copy-code-btn">复制代码</span></code></pre>
<p><strong>二叉树关系图：</strong></p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-mermaid" lang="mermaid">graph TD
root --> left
root --> right
left --> left-left
left --> left-right
left-right --> left-right-left
left-right --> null
right --> right-left
right --> right-right
</code></pre>
<h4 data-id="heading-35">先序遍历</h4>
<p><strong>根</strong>结点 -> <strong>左</strong>子树先序遍历 -> <strong>右</strong>子树先序遍历, 即：</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-js copyable" lang="js"><span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span> <span class="hljs-title">preOrder</span>(<span class="hljs-params">binaryTree</span>) </span>&#123;
  <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> (!binaryTree) <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span>
  <span class="hljs-built_in">console</span>.log(binaryTree.value)
  preOrder(binaryTree.left)
  preOrder(binaryTree.right)
&#125;

preOrder(binaryTreeData)
<span class="hljs-comment">// root</span>
<span class="hljs-comment">// left</span>
<span class="hljs-comment">// left-left</span>
<span class="hljs-comment">// left-right</span>
<span class="hljs-comment">// left-right-left</span>
<span class="hljs-comment">// right</span>
<span class="hljs-comment">// right-left</span>
<span class="hljs-comment">// right-right</span>
<span class="copy-code-btn">复制代码</span></code></pre>
<h4 data-id="heading-36">中序遍历</h4>
<p><strong>左</strong>子树中序遍历 -> <strong>根</strong>结点 -> <strong>右</strong>子树中序遍历，即：</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-js copyable" lang="js"><span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span> <span class="hljs-title">inOrder</span>(<span class="hljs-params">binaryTree</span>) </span>&#123;
  <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> (!binaryTree) <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span>
  inOrder(binaryTree.left)
  <span class="hljs-built_in">console</span>.log(binaryTree.value)
  inOrder(binaryTree.right)
&#125;

inOrder(binaryTreeData)
<span class="hljs-comment">// left-left</span>
<span class="hljs-comment">// left</span>
<span class="hljs-comment">// left-right-left</span>
<span class="hljs-comment">// left-right</span>
<span class="hljs-comment">// root</span>
<span class="hljs-comment">// right-left</span>
<span class="hljs-comment">// right</span>
<span class="hljs-comment">// right-right</span>
<span class="copy-code-btn">复制代码</span></code></pre>
<h4 data-id="heading-37">后序遍历</h4>
<p><strong>左</strong>子树后序遍历 -> <strong>右</strong>子树后序遍历 -> <strong>根</strong>结点，即：</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-js copyable" lang="js"><span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span> <span class="hljs-title">postOrder</span>(<span class="hljs-params">binaryTree</span>) </span>&#123;
  <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> (!binaryTree) <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span>
  postOrder(binaryTree.left)
  postOrder(binaryTree.right)
  <span class="hljs-built_in">console</span>.log(binaryTree.value)
&#125;

postOrder(binaryTreeData)
<span class="hljs-comment">// left-left</span>
<span class="hljs-comment">// left-right-left</span>
<span class="hljs-comment">// left-right</span>
<span class="hljs-comment">// left</span>
<span class="hljs-comment">// right-left</span>
<span class="hljs-comment">// right-right</span>
<span class="hljs-comment">// right</span>
<span class="hljs-comment">// root</span>
<span class="copy-code-btn">复制代码</span></code></pre>
<h2 data-id="heading-38">应用场景</h2>
<h3 data-id="heading-39">domTree、vDom</h3>
<p>在浏览器中的dom结构和react、vue这类框架中的虚拟dom都应用到了树这个数据结构来表示页面元素之间的关系</p>
<h1 data-id="heading-40">七、图</h1>
<h2 data-id="heading-41">简介</h2>
<blockquote>
<p>图是<strong>网络结构</strong>的抽象模型，是一组由<strong>边</strong>链接的结点。图可以表示任何二元关系（如：道路等），在<code>javaScript</code>中可以使用<code>Object</code>来模拟一个图的数据结构</p>
</blockquote>
<h2 data-id="heading-42">图的表示法</h2>
<p>为了更直观的理解<code>图</code>的数据结构及其表示，我们先举一个例子，后面对图的其他操作都基于这个例子来测试：</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-mermaid" lang="mermaid">graph TD
A --> B --> D --> B
B --> C --> E --> A
</code></pre>
<p>在这个图中我们可以很清晰的看出<code>A、B、C、D、E</code>这几个结点的相互关系，那么在<code>javaScript</code>中我们要如何表示这种关系：</p>
<h3 data-id="heading-43">邻接矩阵</h3>





















































<table><thead><tr><th></th><th>A</th><th>B</th><th>C</th><th>D</th><th>E</th></tr></thead><tbody><tr><td>A</td><td>0</td><td>1</td><td>0</td><td>0</td><td>0</td></tr><tr><td>B</td><td>0</td><td>0</td><td>1</td><td>1</td><td>0</td></tr><tr><td>C</td><td>0</td><td>0</td><td>0</td><td>0</td><td>1</td></tr><tr><td>D</td><td>0</td><td>1</td><td>0</td><td>0</td><td>0</td></tr><tr><td>E</td><td>1</td><td>0</td><td>0</td><td>0</td><td>0</td></tr></tbody></table>
<blockquote>
<p><code>邻接矩阵</code>是用一个二维数组来表各顶点之间的关系, 例如<code>A --> B</code>,那么这个二维数组中的<code>arr[0][1]</code>为1，若不能链接，则为0，这种二维数组表示图内每个顶点之间关系的方法就是<code>邻接矩阵</code></p>
</blockquote>
<h3 data-id="heading-44">邻街表</h3>
<pre><code class="hljs language-js copyable" lang="js">&#123;
    <span class="hljs-attr">A</span>: [B],
    <span class="hljs-attr">B</span>: [C, D],
    <span class="hljs-attr">C</span>: [E],
    <span class="hljs-attr">D</span>: [B],
    <span class="hljs-attr">E</span>: [A]
&#125;
<span class="copy-code-btn">复制代码</span></code></pre>
<blockquote>
<p><code>邻街表</code>使用一个对象来表示图中的关系，<code>key</code>为各顶点，<code>value</code>是一个数组，表示该顶点可链接的顶点，使用这种方式表示图中各顶点的方式就叫做<code>邻街表</code></p>
</blockquote>
<h2 data-id="heading-45">图的遍历</h2>
<h3 data-id="heading-46">深度优先遍历</h3>
<p>深度优先遍历是从某一个顶点开始，对该顶点的<code>未遍历</code>相邻顶点依次进行<code>深度优先遍历</code>,即：</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-js copyable" lang="js"><span class="hljs-comment">// 记录遍历过的顶点</span>
<span class="hljs-keyword">const</span> visited = <span class="hljs-keyword">new</span> <span class="hljs-built_in">Set</span>()
<span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span> <span class="hljs-title">dfs</span>(<span class="hljs-params">node</span>) </span>&#123;
  <span class="hljs-built_in">console</span>.log(node)
  visited.add(node)
  graph[node].forEach(<span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-params">childNode</span> =></span> &#123;
    <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> (!visited.has(childNode)) &#123;
      dfs(childNode)
    &#125;
  &#125;)
&#125;

dfs(<span class="hljs-string">'A'</span>)
<span class="hljs-comment">// A B C E D</span>
<span class="copy-code-btn">复制代码</span></code></pre>
<p>我们假设从<code>A</code>顶点开始进行<code>深度优先遍历</code>,那么输入结果为<code>A B C E D</code>,对比前面那张关系图可以看出深度优先遍历的顺序当遍历到<code>C</code>时，会继续遍历<code>E</code>之后才遍历到了<code>D</code>,符合深度优先遍历的规则。</p>
<h3 data-id="heading-47">广度优先遍历</h3>
<p>图的广度优先遍历和<code>树</code>的广度优先遍历类似：</p>
<ol>
<li>需要将<code>根</code>元素入队</li>
<li>再出队并访问</li>
<li>将<code>未遍历</code>的相邻结点依次入队</li>
<li>重复2、3步，直到队列为空, 即：</li>
</ol>
<pre><code class="hljs language-js copyable" lang="js"><span class="hljs-keyword">const</span> visited = <span class="hljs-keyword">new</span> <span class="hljs-built_in">Set</span>()
<span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span> <span class="hljs-title">bfs</span>(<span class="hljs-params">node</span>) </span>&#123;
  <span class="hljs-keyword">const</span> queue = [node]
  <span class="hljs-comment">// 根元素在遍历时要手动添加至已访问队列，后面只是添加了根元素的相邻结点</span>
  visited.add(node)
  <span class="hljs-keyword">while</span>(visitNode = queue.shift()) &#123;
    <span class="hljs-built_in">console</span>.log(visitNode)
    graph[visitNode].forEach(<span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-params">childNode</span> =></span> &#123;
      <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> (!visited.has(childNode)) &#123;
        visited.add(childNode)
        queue.push(childNode)
      &#125;
    &#125;)
  &#125;
&#125;

bfs(<span class="hljs-string">'A'</span>)
<span class="hljs-comment">// A B C D E</span>
<span class="copy-code-btn">复制代码</span></code></pre>
<p>我们从<code>A</code>顶点进行<code>广度优先遍历</code>，当遍历到<code>C</code>结点时，没有继续遍历<code>C</code>下的相邻结点，而是遍历了<code>D</code>,符合广度优先遍历的规则。</p>
<h1 data-id="heading-48">八、堆</h1>
<h2 data-id="heading-49">简介</h2>
<blockquote>
<p>堆是一种<strong>特殊的完全二叉树</strong>，堆中的所有所有结点都<strong>大于等于或小于等于</strong>他的子结点，若<strong>大于等于子结点</strong>则为<code>最大堆</code>，否则为<code>最小堆</code>。在<code>javaScript</code>中通常使用数组来表示堆<br>
对于第<code>i</code>个结点:<br>
其父结点的索引为：<code>Math.floor((i - 1) / 2)</code><br>
其左子结点的索引为：<code>(2 * i) + 1</code><br>
其右子结点的索引为：<code>(2 * i) + 2</code></p>
</blockquote>
<h2 data-id="heading-50">代码实现</h2>
<h3 data-id="heading-51">实现最小堆</h3>
<pre><code class="hljs language-js copyable" lang="js"><span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span> <span class="hljs-title">MinHeap</span>(<span class="hljs-params"></span>) </span>&#123;
  <span class="hljs-built_in">this</span>.heap = []

  <span class="hljs-built_in">this</span>.getParentIndex = <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span> (<span class="hljs-params">childIndex</span>) </span>&#123;
    <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> <span class="hljs-built_in">Math</span>.floor((childIndex - <span class="hljs-number">1</span>) / <span class="hljs-number">2</span>)
  &#125;
  <span class="hljs-comment">/**
   * 交换位置
   * <span class="hljs-doctag">@param <span class="hljs-type">&#123;number&#125;</span> <span class="hljs-variable">index1</span></span>
   * <span class="hljs-doctag">@param <span class="hljs-type">&#123;number&#125;</span> <span class="hljs-variable">index2</span></span>
   */</span>
  <span class="hljs-built_in">this</span>.swap = <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span> (<span class="hljs-params">index1, index2</span>) </span>&#123;
    <span class="hljs-keyword">const</span> temp = <span class="hljs-built_in">this</span>.heap[index1]
    <span class="hljs-built_in">this</span>.heap[index1] = <span class="hljs-built_in">this</span>.heap[index2]
    <span class="hljs-built_in">this</span>.heap[index2] = temp
  &#125;

  <span class="hljs-comment">/**
   * 上移到合适位置,和父结点比较，如果比父结点小则交换
   * <span class="hljs-doctag">@param <span class="hljs-type">&#123;number&#125;</span> </span>index 索引
   */</span>
  <span class="hljs-built_in">this</span>.moveUp = <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span> (<span class="hljs-params">index</span>) </span>&#123;
    <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> (index === <span class="hljs-number">0</span>) <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span>
    <span class="hljs-keyword">const</span> parentIndex = <span class="hljs-built_in">this</span>.getParentIndex(index)
    <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> (<span class="hljs-built_in">this</span>.heap[index] < <span class="hljs-built_in">this</span>.heap[parentIndex]) &#123;
      <span class="hljs-built_in">this</span>.swap(index, parentIndex)
      <span class="hljs-built_in">this</span>.moveUp(parentIndex)
    &#125;
  &#125;
  <span class="hljs-comment">/**
   * 添加元素
   * <span class="hljs-doctag">@param <span class="hljs-type">&#123;number&#125;</span> <span class="hljs-variable">value</span></span>
   */</span>
  <span class="hljs-built_in">this</span>.append = <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span> (<span class="hljs-params">value</span>) </span>&#123;
    <span class="hljs-built_in">this</span>.heap.push(value)
    <span class="hljs-built_in">this</span>.moveUp(<span class="hljs-built_in">this</span>.heap.length - <span class="hljs-number">1</span>)
  &#125;
&#125;

<span class="hljs-keyword">const</span> minHeap = <span class="hljs-keyword">new</span> MinHeap()
minHeap.append(<span class="hljs-number">3</span>)
minHeap.append(<span class="hljs-number">4</span>)
minHeap.append(<span class="hljs-number">1</span>)
minHeap.append(<span class="hljs-number">0</span>)
minHeap.append(<span class="hljs-number">2</span>)
minHeap.append(<span class="hljs-number">7</span>)
minHeap.append(<span class="hljs-number">9</span>)
<span class="hljs-comment">// [0, 1, 3, 4, 2, 7, 9]</span>
<span class="copy-code-btn">复制代码</span></code></pre>
<p>通过<code>heap</code>可以模拟一个堆的表示，即：</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-mermaid" lang="mermaid">graph TD
0 --- 1 --- 4
0 --- 3 --- 7
1 --- 2
3 --- 9
</code></pre>
<p>可以看到这个结构满足<code>最小堆</code>的定义</p>
<h2 data-id="heading-52">应用场景</h2>
<h3 data-id="heading-53">1. 高效快速找到最大值最小值</h3>
<p>可以通过构建<code>最大堆</code>或<code>最小堆</code>快速找到最大最小值</p>
<h3 data-id="heading-54">2. 实现堆排序</h3>
<p>上面我们实现了一个简单构建<code>最小堆</code>的方法，那么实现堆排序的原理其实就是先构建一个<code>最小堆</code>然后将堆顶（最小值弹出），再将其他元素构建堆，每次都弹出<code>堆顶</code>元素直到剩余元素为1时结束，这样就是实现了一个堆排序。</p>
<h1 data-id="heading-55">九、最后</h1>
<blockquote>
<p>这里主要介绍了几种常见的数据结构及不同数据结构的使用场景，也分别写了一些简化版的代码，虽然功能会少一点，但是简单的代码更容易理解和记住，感兴趣的小伙伴也可以自己实现更多更复杂的功能。一方面是对自己学习做一个总结，同时也希望可以对大家有帮助。<br>
<strong>感谢阅读 🙏</strong></p>
</blockquote></div>  
</div>
